# 🧠 Pull Request Template

## ✨ What’s Changed?

> Describe what this PR does — be clear and concise  
(Example: “Refactored document retriever to support fallback mechanism”)

---

## 🔍 Related Issues

> Does this PR close or relate to any existing issues?  
(Example: Closes #12)

---

## ✅ Checklist

- [ ] My changes are tested in n8n and run without errors
- [ ] I updated the system diagram (if logic changed)
- [ ] I updated the README (if applicable)
- [ ] My commit history is clean and descriptive

---

## 📸 Screenshots or Diagrams (Optional)

> Include before/after examples or updated flow image (if visual logic changed)

---

## 🧪 Testing Notes

> Briefly explain how to trigger/test this change in the workflow  
(Example: Run webhook with missing API key to trigger fallback)

---

## 🧩 Notes for Reviewers

> Anything extra the reviewer should be aware of (e.g. edge cases, known limitations)

---
